mapper.sql: SELECT ID , VENDOR , DISPLAY_SIZE FROM LAPTOP WHERE VENDOR = #{vendor}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LAPTOP ( ID , VENDOR , DISPLAY_SIZE , DELETED ) VALUES ( LAPTOP_ID_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL , #{vendor} , #{displaySize} , false )

MERGE INTO LAPTOP T USING ( SELECT #{id} ID , #{vendor} VENDOR , #{displaySize} DISPLAY_SIZE , #{deleted} DELETED FROM DUAL ) D ON ( T.ID = D.ID ) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET T.VENDOR = D.VENDOR , T.DISPLAY_SIZE = D.DISPLAY_SIZE , T.DELETED = D.DELETED WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( T.ID , T.VENDOR , T.DISPLAY_SIZE , T.DELETED ) VALUES ( LAPTOP_ID_SEQUENCE.NEXTVAL , D.VENDOR , D.DISPLAY_SIZE , D.DELETED )
